I recently started looking back at my childhood in an attempt to understand why i am going through limerence. I was brought up in my grandmothers place and moved from there once i reached high school. Though i did adjust well after the initial hiccups , i was deeply attached to my old place and I believe that was one of the starting points for me to have these severe attachments or obsessions because i donâ€™t remember having any LOs before that.  .
